mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_E_MAIL , E.EMP_TEL , E.EMP_PHONE , E.EMP_JOIN_DATE , E.EMP_PROFILE_NAME , C.COM_NAME AS COM_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE , R.RANK_NAME AS RANK_CODE , J.JOB_NAME AS EMP_JOB_CODE , T.RIGHT_NAME AS RIGHT_CODE FROM EMP E JOIN COM C ON E.COM_CODE = C.COM_CODE JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE JOIN JOB J ON E.EMP_JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN RIGHT T ON E.RIGHT_CODE = T.RIGHT_CODE WHERE EMP_STATUS = 'N' OR EMP_STATUS ='R'

SELECT E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_E_MAIL , E.EMP_TEL , E.EMP_PHONE , E.EMP_JOIN_DATE , E.EMP_PROFILE_NAME , C.COM_NAME AS COM_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE , R.RANK_NAME AS RANK_CODE , J.JOB_NAME AS EMP_JOB_CODE , T.RIGHT_NAME AS RIGHT_CODE FROM EMP E JOIN COM C ON E.COM_CODE = C.COM_CODE JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE JOIN JOB J ON E.EMP_JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN RIGHT T ON E.RIGHT_CODE = T.RIGHT_CODE WHERE EMP_STATUS = 'N' AND EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%' OR EMP_STATUS ='R' AND EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{word} || '%'

SELECT A.DEPT_CODE , (CASE WHEN A.HIGH_DEPT_CODE = null THEN A.DEPT_NAME WHEN A.HIGH_DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE THEN B.DEPT_NAME END) AS HIGHT_DEPT_CODE , A.DEPT_NAME , A.DEPT_HEAD_CODE , A.DEPT_STATUS , A.DEPT_DEPTH FROM DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPT B ON A.HIGH_DEPT_CODE = B.DEPT_CODE WHERE A.DEPT_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY A.DEPT_DEPTH, A.DEPT_CODE ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMP WHERE EMP_STATUS = 'N' OR EMP_STATUS = 'R'

SELECT E.EMP_CODE , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_E_MAIL , E.EMP_TEL , E.EMP_PHONE , E.EMP_JOIN_DATE , E.EMP_PROFILE_NAME , E.EMP_BIRTHDAY , E.EMP_PROMOTION_DATE , E.EMP_ADDRESS1 , E.EMP_ADDRESS2 , E.EMP_ETC , E.EMP_STATUS , C.COM_NAME AS COM_CODE , D.DEPT_NAME AS DEPT_CODE , R.RANK_NAME AS RANK_CODE , J.JOB_NAME AS EMP_JOB_CODE , T.RIGHT_NAME AS RIGHT_CODE FROM EMP E JOIN COM C ON E.COM_CODE = C.COM_CODE JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE JOIN RANK R ON E.RANK_CODE = R.RANK_CODE JOIN JOB J ON E.EMP_JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE JOIN RIGHT T ON E.RIGHT_CODE = T.RIGHT_CODE WHERE EMP_STATUS = 'N' OR EMP_STATUS ='R' ORDER BY E.EMP_CODE ASC
